A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am at a lost why the critics and a lot of the audience love this movie. From a narrative/story structure perspective\, it's a total mess. It doesn't fit in well with the rest of the Star Wars universe both tone and story wise. Sure it sounds good and looks great though. What they did to Luke's character is a travesty. The hero of the OT completely mishandled. The choices that he makes in this film aren't consistent with who is was in the OT. And his death scene is a total joke. What a waste of a movie. Completely disappointed.
